content: others if you use this pattern to make items for commercial use please give me credit for the pattern please feel free to sell any completed items made from my designed pattern or donate any completed items to charity do not copy reproduce sell and/or distribute this pattern in any form this design and material are copyrighted and protected by federal copyright infringement knit little sea creatures designed by lorraine pistorio i hope you enjoy creating your own little sea creature 2 k 9 k1 k2tog x 10 = 20 sts 3 k3 k2tog x 10 = 40 sts 10 k 4 k 11 k2tog x 10 = 10 sts 5 k2tog x 20 = 20 sts 12 k 6 k do not bind off cut yarn leaving long tail and thread 7 k2tog x 10 = 10 sts yarn tail onto large-eyed blunt needle thread do not bind off needle through loops of the remaining 10 sts but do cut yarn not pull up to gather yet stuff the crab firmly then leaving long tail pull up on yarn to gather and secure and thread yarn use the long tails to close the openings between the tail onto large- legs and claws crab should sit flat on a surface eyed blunt secure yarn tails needle thread needle through embroider the eyes and mouth… loops of the create eyes and mouth as you wish to make the remaining 10 eyes i used a french knot wrapping the yarn around the sts and pull up needle 4x to gather and secure place the 34 sts from yarn holder a onto the needles continuing now with the top of the crab… round 1 cast on 4 sts onto the right needle then k3 from each of the next 4 legs cast on 3 more sts i use the knitted cast-on underside method here then k5 from the left claw cast on 6 more sts k5 from the right claw cast on 3 more sts k3 from each of the last 4 legs = 50 sts 2-4 k 5 k3 k2tog x 10 = 40 sts 6 k 7 k2 k2tog x 10 = 30 sts 8 k 8 inquiries contact rainebodesigns@yahoo com like rainebo designs on facebook http //www facebook com/rainebo-designs-1732403310368724/ ©2017 lorraine pistorio this pattern is not to be sold or given for free to others if you use this pattern to make items for commercial use please give me credit for the pattern please feel free to sell any completed items made from my designed pattern or donate any completed items to charity do not copy reproduce sell and/or distribute this pattern in any form this design and material are copyrighted and protected by federal copyright infringement
